user_query: I'm a food blogger and I'm looking for interesting recipes that are also eco-friendly. Can you recommend some recipes using sustainable ingredients? I would also like to calculate the carbon footprint of a recipe using the weight of the paper used for printing the recipe.

TaskList.description: Search for eco-friendly recipes that use sustainable ingredients.
Gather nutritional information and carbon footprint data for the recommended recipes.
Calculate the carbon footprint of the recipe based on the weight of the paper used for printing.
